column1: Yeah this does not amount to rigging. Poor choice of words. It stinks though. You don't give a candidate veto over DNC staff that early.
(that was a joke btw. It's late and I suddenly wonder if it was lame as hell.)
I'm sorry, ya sit, but showing me these pics while I have no way to indulge is, I'm sure you'll agree, a clear act of terrorism!
>> not cool. Did not affect the result though. Make no mistake.
No, Donna Brazile didn't get it wrong. In exchange for financially saving the party Hillary got veto on key DNC staff. Not criminal, but >>
Thx. But I understand from what you said that it's much less a thing? That in rap the homage is more subtle but still clear to the audience?
>> any of it swung the primary race even a bit, but as the Brits say, that's not cricket.
To me that memo confirms precisely what I took away from Brazile's piece. DoC and all other staff as acceptable to HFA". I don't think >>"
Are there any tracks that rappers *do* cover often in concert the way rockers cover standards?
Yeah, Brazile was not wrong. https:// twitter.com/ThePlumLineGS/ status/926571349677674496 …
I kinda lost track last 2-3 weeks, what with my Wolverines stinking. Rosen and Darnold cooled off?
?? Mayfield vs Rudolph? i.e. all the really exciting ones will be gone by the time we pick? :-\
זה אני לא זוכר. גבוה רזה תלתלים
או'סאליבן מדהים. מת עליו. לא מתנחל? נדמה היה לי שכן.
אני זוכר היינו באים לאור וליאור בימי ראשון, פוטבול, ספרד, איטליה - גבי והחבר המתנחל שלו מעבירים כל רגע לאו'סאליבן נגד היגינס :-)
שזה? נקודה מסוימת או כל מקום מעבר לקו הכדורים האחרון?
וואלה. טוב, סך הנקודות על השולחן היה טיפה יותר גדול מהיתרון, אבל עדיין מסביר. אם הלבן נכנס לחור, מאיפה המכה הבאה? בול אין האנד?
